DOC.brief_title: Endothelial Bleb Response With Toric Lenses
DOC.detailed_description: Interested subject meet entry criterion study schedule four session approximately 30 minute duration . Informed consent obtain . Baseline measurement visual acuity corneal conjunctival physiology record . An examination endothelium cornea conduct use specular microscope , reading obtain 5 location cornea : one centre one superior , inferior , nasal temporal peripheral region , approximately 2mm limbal margin . The assigned lens insert accord fixed-allocation randomization schedule , session follow optimize 2- period simultaneous crossover design , specify lens use four session . Lenses worn 20 minute remove . Endothelial specular microscopy conduct 20 minute lens . A final evaluation corneal conjunctival physiology perform prior subject clearance study .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Successful soft contact lens wear daily mode minimum 1 month prior start study without experience difficulty contact lens related complication . 2 . At least 18 year age mentally competent sign inform consent form . 3 . Healthy eye use ocular medication . 4 . Similarity optical parameter eye . 5 . Physical appearance typical Asian eye 1 . A medical ocular condition may influence outcome trial . 2 . Current use ocular/systemic medication may influence outcome trial . 3 . Failure wear soft lens 2 week prior start study . 4 . Current enrolment participation another clinical study . 5 . Current state pregnancy breastfeed 6 . Anisometropia great 1.00D ( equivalent sphere ) . 7 . Unequal acuity eye ( great 1 line ) 8 . Unequal corneal curvature ( > 1.00D )
